p: Besides, we speculated on the protein interaction networks of the 131 candidate genes through STRING software and described the largest independent protein network comprising of 31 candidate genes using Cytoscape software ( Figure 3). Then, we used 12 topology analysis methods to detect the top 5 hub genes of this largest network by cytoHubba plug-in respectively. We found that both NOD2 and MAVS gene appeared in 8 methods with most frequently (Table S4).
